column1: | for gerald d. howard gerald d. howard
column5: 2015 at 7:50 pm at carle foundation hospital in urbana. he was born december 19
column7: the son of ivan and daisy (vandevender) howard. gerald married cynthia williams july 1
column8: 1967 in danville and they enjoyed 47 years of marriage together. she survives and will miss him dearly. also surviving are his daughters
column11: and penny (scott) jones of danville; grandchildren
column19: kenny (sharon) howard of danville and wayne (rita) howard of fithian; sister
column22: virginia howard of olivet. he was preceded in death by his parents
column27: deanna & marc anthony. gerald worked at continental filling for several years and then went to work for general motors company retiring after 25 years of dedicated hard work. gerald enjoyed going fishing. he also loved to play the lottery and hoped hed be the lucky winner every time. geralds presence will be missed by all who knew and loved him. a celebration of geralds life will be held thursday
column29: 2015 at 1:00 pm at sunset-urbas funeral chapel
column30: westville. visitation will be held from 11 to 1 thursday at the funeral home prior to the service. pastor dan ziebart will officiate. he will be laid to rest at sunset memorial park in danville. to send flowers or a remembrance gift to the family of gerald d. howard please visit our tribute store. upcoming events25. jun. thursday visitation11:00 am - 1:00 pm sunset-urbas funeral chapel414 s. state street
